animeTitle: Licca-chan to Yamaneko Hoshi no Tabi
animeDescription: Based on the popular Licca doll in Japan. Licca meets a mysterious cat.  Licca goes on vacation with her father. The town in the mountains they go to is the site of a festival of the stars that has a mystical background, which is more real than Licca expected when she ends up in the middle of the mystical battle for the festival.  (Source: AniDB)
animeRelated: ['Super Doll Licca-chan', 'Licca-chan Fushigi na Mahou no Ring', 'Licca-chan no Nichiyoubi', 'Licca-chan Fushigi na Fushigi na Yunia Monogatari']
animeStaff: [['Yuasa Masaaki', ['Layout', 'Key Animation']], ['Takada Akemi', ['Character Design']], ['Kusumoto Yuuko', ['Animation Director']], ['Tetsuhito Saito', ['Key Animation']]]
